name: Perian - Party Card Game
description:
The perfect card based Party-Game to make every party fun! Heres a list of Features this game is providing:

  • A Drinking Game for everone too lazy to think of their own!
  • Make your Party Fun!
  • Multiple Card-Packs in different Themes
  • 200+ custom and challenging Cards
  • Create your own Cards and Packs and share them easily with your Friends
  • Completely Free on Mobile and Desktop

Open the Game, select a few card Packs and youre ready to go!

It automatically shuffles all your selected Card-Packs (includes your custom created packs) and gives you a random Card whenever you click! The Cards contain crazy and fun challenges for one or more players to fulfill. 

This Game will be a Friend, which will accompany you on all your Partys and makes sure you will have a great time with your Friends!

Perian was developed to be played with drinks containing no alcohol. Whoever goes to the Toilet first looses! If you still decide to play with Alcohol, know your limit and make sure you stay in controll.

(All Preset Card-Packs are in German, the Game itself is in English! So if you dont speak German you can still create your own Card-Packs with ease)
